step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders relatively stable. Focus on a more controlled movement of your elbows and wrists as you begin the stretch overhead.
Your shoulder position is good. Try to bring your elbows closer together as you make a fist and squeeze your shoulder blades. This will enhance the muscle engagement.
Excellent work squeezing your shoulder blades together! For the next repetition, aim to make a tighter fist and feel the squeeze throughout your arms and shoulders.
You're doing well extending your arms overhead. Focus on a smooth exhale and a complete relaxation of your muscles as you return to the starting position.
Great job on the repetitions! To improve further, try to maintain a consistent fist and shoulder blade squeeze throughout the entire downward push.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the Push Down Pumping exercise. Remember to keep your fists tight and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you push down. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement throughout each repetition.
